About Us

Building a Future Where Access to Quality Healthcare Doesn't Depend on Location

Patient-First Approach

At Doutor, every decision we make begins with the patient in mind. We focus on delivering care that is not only clinically effective but also compassionate, accessible, and respectful of your time and privacy.

Licensed, Trusted Professionals

We partner only with certified, experienced medical providers. Whether it's general care, mental health, or specialty services, you'll always speak with real doctors who are qualified, vetted, and committed to your well-being.

Care Without Boundaries

Geography shouldn't limit your access to healthcare. With Doutor, anyone with a device and an internet connection can connect to trusted doctors—no matter where they live, work, or travel.

              General Medical

              Feeling sick or have non-emergency symptoms like cold, flu, or allergies? Our doctors are available 24/7 to provide quick answers, prescriptions, and peace of mind.

              Book Now

              Mental Health

              Struggling with stress, anxiety, or burnout? Speak privately with licensed therapists or psychiatrists from the comfort of your home—no judgment, just support.

              Start Therapy

              Prescription Refills

              Running low on medication? Get fast, secure refills without leaving the house. Our doctors can review, renew, and send your prescription to your pharmacy.

              Frequently Asked Questions

              Everything You Need to Know About Doutor

              Booking is simple: sign up or log in to your Doutor account, select the doctor or specialty you need, and choose a time that fits your schedule.

              Many doctors are available for same-day appointments.

              Yes, you can. Doutor works with or without insurance. If you don’t have coverage, you can still book a visit and pay a flat, transparent fee directly.

              Doutor doctors can help with common illnesses like colds, flu, infections, allergies, and skin issues, as well as ongoing conditions such as diabetes or hypertension.

              For emergencies, we recommend calling your local emergency services instead of using Doutor.

              If your doctor determines that medication is needed, they can send an electronic prescription directly to your preferred pharmacy after your virtual visit.

              Yes. Doutor uses secure, HIPAA-compliant technology to protect your personal and medical information.

              Your data is encrypted and never shared without your consent.

              Absolutely. You can browse available doctors by specialty, read their profiles, and select the provider you prefer for your appointment.

              Doutor works on most devices including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and desktop computers.

              You just need a stable internet connection, a camera, and a microphone.

              Download Our App

              Your Health in Your Pocket—Anywhere, Anytime

              Take Doutor with you wherever life takes you. Book appointments, chat with your doctor, access records, and manage prescriptions—all from your mobile device with just a few taps.

              Insurance or Not — You're Always Covered with Doutor

              Whether you have full coverage, partial benefits, or no insurance at all, Doutor gives you affordable access to certified doctors anytime you need care—no barriers, no hidden fees.
